changelog: Stabilized hybrid sync scheduling to reduce redundant full sync cycles.
Improved shutdown safety to avoid SQLite closed-database race conditions.
Reduced realtime fallback noise when Change Streams are unavailable.
Moved notification bridge initialization after QApplication creation.
Improved release/build scripts to read version dynamically.
notes_ar: تحديث استقرار: تحسين المزامنة، تقليل الضوضاء في السجل، وإغلاق آمن بدون أخطاء قاعدة البيانات.
notes_en: Stability update: improved sync scheduling, cleaner logs, and safer shutdown handling.
